author: wn.com
title: UNCG Alumni Association to host Greensboro Candidate Forum (The University of North Carolina at Greensboro) ...
text: ( Source : The University of North Carolina at Greensboro ) The UNCG Alumni Association 's Spartan Legislative Network will once again be hosting the Greensboro Municipal Candidate Forum on Thursday, Oct. 29 , from 6-8 p.m. in the Virginia Dare
